titles.title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act
Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act
Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act
Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act
Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act
To adjust the boundaries of Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands Discharged.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 107-90.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 46.

action.text: Mr. Jones (NC) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 640.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman under authority of the order of the Senate of 06/26/2002 with an amendment. With written report No. 107-204.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 481.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Hansen moved that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on the motion to suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment to H.R. 640.

vote.text: On motion that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 8/1/2002--Passed Senate amended. Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act - Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to adjust the boundaries of the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area in California. Allows the acquisition of lands within the included wildlife corridor expansion zone only by donation or with donated funds.
